texts.name: Stingers
texts.biography: Stingers, the fearsome wasp hero, is a master of venomous warfare, inspiring his allies to strike with lethal precision. With sleek, jet-black wings and a brown venom-coated stinger that gleams in battle, he leads his units with unmatched ferocity. Under his command, the swarm gains a potent venom bonus, turning every attack into a deadly poison that ensures their enemies' swift demise.

specialty.name: Passive Bonus: Venomous Poison
specialty.description: All creatures receive chance to poison target after attack.
